website_summaries.verdict: Provides a high level of protection with a cotton terry surface and water repellent fabrics. Repels liquids but allows air to circulate.
pros: Designed to tightly fit mattresses as deep as 19 inches with an elastic band all around the sheet
Gives you a hypoallergenic barrier against dust mites and other allergens
Can be machine washed when it needs to be cleaned
Breathable materials should keep you comfortable all night long
cons: May not give you the highest level of waterproof protection for your mattress

customer_reviews.title: NOISY Plastic
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is NOISY! I'm not sure if the people who wrote the "not noisy" responses to the question above were sent a different product, but the one I received is noisy. Thinking maybe the product has changed because all of the "No" responses are from 2016. I am returning this & feel like their description is misleading (if not an outright lie). In my picture, you can see that the underside that goes against the mattress is nothing but plastic.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G., 15 yo dog peed in his sleep & this "waterproof" mattress pad is a sham! Urine went right through it, and we had a fitted sheet & sheet on top. * **Highly disappointed & now have to have mattress cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Strong

customer_reviews.title: NO LONGER HAVE TO WASH MY BIG PUFFY MATTRESS COVER THAT HELPS MY PAIN IN THE NIGHT
customer_reviews.text: i PURCHASED THIS AS A 3 YEAR OLD GREAT GRANDDAUGHTER LIKES TO SNEAK INTO NANA'S BED. When her pull-ups don't do the trick there is only a sheet and a light mattress protector to wash. one layer is waterproof and top layer is very thin absorbent fabric. It's still an ordeal to unmake, was, and make up a king sized Purple mattress, however, the whole set up gives this old broken down granny the ability to sleep. Wouldn't give up a moment with that sweet little child. She is learning to make the bed as well. Great teaching moments. Don't let them pass you by.
customer_reviews.author: Gram Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I own a Beautyrest Recharge, 14.0" Mattress Height, and fits perfectly. I washed it before putting on my bed and didnt rip. I bought two for when im washing one.
customer_reviews.author: iRaptor

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS IT SHOULD PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: ITS AMAZING! Pet had an accident in our bed (has medical issues) and NOTHING went through to the mattress. Washed it and put it back on like nothing happened! I love it! Wanted to wait a little longer to write a review but if anything changes I’ll come back and edit. Had it for about two weeks now. Highly recommend. I do notice a little bit of a noise it makes however it isn’t loud in my opinion and doesn’t disturb my sleep (I’m a fairly light sleeper unless I’m super drained).
customer_reviews.author: Shonteka

customer_reviews.title: item as described
customer_reviews.text: This item is as described. I give it 4 stars not 5 because it doesn't smooth out completely underneath the bed's fitted sheet. I think this is due to the plastic/waterproof lining it has. So I can feel little folds and wrinkles in it through the fitted sheet. It isn't terrible but slightly noticeable. I am used to mattress pads that are all fabric and fit more snugly against the mattress, my guess is that my experience is part of the nature of a waterproof lining, not specific to this one particular product.
customer_reviews.author: JRinGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the highest quality product but it serves its purpose perfectly. I have a thick mattress and wanted a little extra protection for it (new mattress). I use this under my mattress pad, and it stays in place and gives me peace of mind. I haven't washed it, because there have been no accidents, so I can't attest to how it will hold up with washing. I thought I should also mention, it does not give you that hot sticky feeling that some plastic mattress covers can. It's not crunchy feeling at all. I like very soft high quality bedding and this cover does not interfere with me enjoying the opulence I love in my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberli B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for bed soakers
customer_reviews.text: If you are using this for a toddler potty training or someone who would wake up mid pee and finish in the bathroom these would work great. I bought them for my 17 year old with disabilities and wears a diaper to bed. She soaks through her diaper as well as these pads. Luckily I have her mattress in a zipper plastic protector. They wash great and don't take up a lot of room in Washington machine. For most people I think these would work great but caution for extreme bed soakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality, deep pockets and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of this mattress cover in various sizes. I like the deep pockets. I also like the texture and the fact that it does not krinkle like other waterproof mattress covers. I have bought thus as protection from my pets who occasionally use my beds to do their business. When I was out of town and had a pet sitter, I used a second mattress cover to cover my entire bed. I know I could close the door, but this punishes my good pets. I can go months with no pet issues. The cover washes beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: sdsvx

customer_reviews.title: I have one on every bed!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress protector isn’t crunchy like other ones I have purchased. Meaning when you roll around in bed, it doesn’t make sound. I used while potty training 2 children and never had a leak onto the mattress. **hint-while potty training, buy a couple and alternate fitted sheet and mattress protector. In the middle of the night, you don’t have to scramble to find new sheets. All you have to do is pull off the first two layers!
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These type mattress protectors are by far the best. Different company labels, but, the quality is the same. I have tried multiple different types but this type is the best. Nothing gets into the mattress. I have a child that pees through his night diapers almost nightly. This is the only type protector that is truest 100% water proof. The quality is great. Doesn’t change the comfort of the mattress. No vinyl feel to it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent waterproofing matress protector
customer_reviews.text: I have used this waterproof cover for approx 18 months now. Twice during those months I spilled some liquids on my bedsheet. This protector helped me save my expensive matress on both those occasions I must say this is an excellent quality matress protector. I would definitely buy this again if I need in future. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It also sounds like you're lying on some type of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new mattress protector simply to replace my old trusty protector. I was hoping this would be a comparable replacement, albeit less expensive, unfortunately it is not. It was very thin and lightweight. I was afraid the side pieces were going to tear while placing it on the mattress. It also sounds like you're lying on some type of plastic, which causes a soft noise whenever you move. Additionally, due to the materials, it caused me to sweat during the night (something I did not experience with my original mattress protector). Overall, I think it works as claimed, however, it was not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kay O.

customer_reviews.title: NOT AT ALL WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible!! I purchased three sets of these over the course of a few months to replace some that I had on our children’s beds. Sadly, the return window on some of them has just closed (last week) and this evening I found out that they are anything BUT waterproof!! When my youngest had an overnight issue, I now have a completely ruined mattress and nearly $90 worth of useless bedsheets. DO NOT PURCHASE THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Krista R

customer_reviews.title: Useless purchase, NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. I bought it to protect a mattress from occasional accidents from a toddler and it has not kept the mattress dry once. It is falsely advertised... it is NOT waterproof!!! Also, it is ridiculously hot to sleep on, it makes the mattress stifling. The only positive to note is that it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it and buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I have never used my mattress without this protector and it has preserved it incredibly. It has seen water spills, my dog on her period jumping on the bed and weekly washing and drying it on a machine. Not a damage to it! I must say it did warm me up during summer months though (I bought this back in May and I live in Florida). I have a 10 inch mattress and the fitted part covers it all with space left on the bottom, so it would fit a taller mattress for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Good fit on our queen matters, high quality, actually protects
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2/11/2016 The early purchase is still going strong and was actually put to the test when I had a nose bleed. The protector stopped the small amount of blood from getting through to the mattress and the blood stain on the protector came out in the wash. We were so impressed that we bought a second cover for the twin bed. Original review (Nov. 22, 2015): Exactly as advertised, fits well, even on deep mattress..The quality is fine and it is soft and "quiet" to sleep on. Only time will tell if it will last may years, but it is well made and nicely finished.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Maven

customer_reviews.title: Not durable! :(  Really would like my money back.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old son, who still wets the bed at night. Sadly, this sheet only worked for a month, despite washing only on the "bedding" setting, and only drying on "low heat" to protect the waterproof backing. Other sheets we've purchased in the past worked for much longer. There are no visible holes whatsoever, but somehow, urine leaks through every time. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, waterproof, and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cooling gel memory foam mattress and was looking for a breathable yet water proof mattress protector. This protector fit perfectly on my king sized mattress and is definitely breatheable the material is towel like and doesn't make sounds like vinyl would if you move in your sleep. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Fabric had a hole in it but over all ok product
customer_reviews.text: The item shipped to us had a hole in the fabric about the size of my fist. I also accidentally ordered the wrong size. I was going to return it just for the hole but the packaging got thrown away. Over all it seems like a good product. I was just bummed out it was damaged. Still usable. I ordered a Queen by accident I meant to order a twin. That was my fault. My son says it’s comfortable. And it doesn’t leak onto his mattress! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Definetly puppy proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to prevent puppy accidents seeping into my mattress. We’ve had only two minor accidents on our bed with this product protecting my mattress. This product defended against the urine soaking into the mattress both times. We gave the product a wash and after coming out of the wash, there was no tearing or any product abnormalities. I would recommend this product to anyone trying to defend against the same types of accidents (with children and/or pets).
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The cover seems to be of good quality with a sheer stretchy side panels that tuck ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this cover for a week so I can't leave information about longevity or durability over time but I'm impressed so far. The cover seems to be of good quality with a sheer stretchy side panels that tuck around the mattress to fit nicely with a thick but not excessive top panel that is clearly waterproof as observed by the texture on the inside with a nice soft terry outside. Over all I'm thrilled with my purchase at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & price
customer_reviews.text: My kidz all have 4 legs and they love sleeping in bed with me. Either as youngsters or as they get older sometimes they have accidents. This mattress protector allows me to keep the bed and still let the kidz sleep with me. I have a spare mattress protector on the ready in case the accident is in the middle of the night. The best part about this protector is that it's quiet. You don't hear the "crinkle" of the plastic liner when everyone is playing or getting settled into bed
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Mattress from Dog or Cat Urine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these because the price was great. I paid $40 for one at a bedding store and the waterproof backing turned into powder inside of three years. I have been using this one our mattress for several months, the other day one of our pets peed on the bed. This protected our mattress very well. I washed it separate so it would get really clean. I had to fluff it dry with no heat several times and rhen still hang it out to get the terry material fully dry. I was so glad to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Himes

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Love the material. As others have pointed out it isn't completely silent but if a slight swish sound doesnt bother you when you move in bed its great. The fit is pretty good just wish the waterproof part was a little bigger. As is it barely covers the top on my mattress. Edited to add that it lasted less than 2 months I take my 4 star rating back.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Soft, waterproof, and doesn't melt in the dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second one. This does a great job protecting our mattress, we have a cat who is getting older and throws up frequently, unfortunately, a lot of times on our bed. It will soak through all of our bedding, but not once has it reached through to our mattress. Many mattress protectors I've had in the past would melt in the dryer, not this one. I love it and love the terry top.
customer_reviews.author: Lmb812

customer_reviews.title: Mattress Cover Is Not Potty Proof
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this mattress cover for over two-years and discovered that it does not holdup to be waterproof as advertise. Our son occasionally sleeps with us and has accidents now and then. Very disappointing to discover wetness soaked into our nice mattress. We will purchased another brand for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McKee

customer_reviews.title: Works well and doesn’t sound/feel like sleeping on plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with how this works! It doesn’t let any accidents through and also doesn’t sound or feel like you’re sleeping on plastic. The top is like a terry towel. The only drawback is it comes out of the washing machine feeling soaking wet still for some reason. I just turn my spin cycle back on a couple times to dry it off more.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Murray

customer_reviews.title: Discolored spots
customer_reviews.text: Seems to protect bed just fine. It has discolored spots like ink splotches all over the terry cloth part that won’t come out in the wash which bothers me. It may have been a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Terynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works fantastically
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent and did the job. I love the hypoallergenic aspect of it, and it fit very tightly over both my mattress and the goosedown pillowtop I have over it. There was even room to spare, if my mattress was even thicker. The tight elastic, however, meant that even though the cover was a bit bigger than I needed, it still fit very firmly and holds everything in place well. Couple this with the sheet clips I also bought, and there's no more pillowtop sliding out of place and sheets popping off the corners every night.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley S

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Cover. Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My existing mattress cover was wearing out so it was time for a replacement. This popped up as a daily deal and the price was lower than lesser quality covers at my local Kohl's. I love daily/lighting deals! It seems very soft and sturdy. Doesn't feel like there's plasticy backing. It's very quiet and stays on! I tend to get sweaty at night and I feel like maybe this is more breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Caeles

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up
customer_reviews.text: Got this when I was pregnant, just in case I went in to labor or the baby ever had an accident. Fits well on a deep mattress. Not crinkly at all and don't know I have it on. Still holding up 3 yrs later and hasn't stained or torn even after routine washing
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: seems fine
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to cover a dorm mattress BEFORE placing the gel foam topper on top of it as a barrier between the mattress and gel pad. It was soft and easy to put on. It did take a while to dry after washing it, maybe because of the waterproof property? Seems like it will be fine for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We bought this waterproof mattress protector for our bed for our up coming home birth. The first day we had it on, our toddler had an overflow accident through his diaper. So not even a direct pool onto the bed. It went right through this "waterproof" protector. Thankfully, we had a 2nd mattress protector underneath which saved our mattress. Returned immediately, but unfortunately now we won't have the back up protection for our birth as we planned by purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A must for new mattress protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits the mattress perfectly, entirely waterproof and doesn’t make that dreaded crinkle sound that some mattress protectors do. Highly recommend Machine washable and durable
customer_reviews.author: Rchowd

customer_reviews.title: This bed cushion is great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thoroughly enjoys this product and finds that it is comfortable as well as practical since she likes them and wants to use them for working out she had to return them due to one not working. They were great about it and are sending her a nw
customer_reviews.author: cviola

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: This item is less than a year old. Its only been washed a few times in cold water and with no dryer sheets and a piddle from my 6 pound teacup maltese leaked through it. That was bearly any liquid at all. THIS ITEM IS NOT WATERPROOF! Save yourself the grief and Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LEAK!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people would claim it leaks. We immediately tested it when it arrived. We held it over the bathtub, poured a large glass of water onto it, rubbed it around and felt the underside of it many times for leaks. Not a drop went through. We even purchased a second one for our dogs queen mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Is not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Super unimpressed. I had two layers of this on my sons bed and he peed through both layers. Its been several months since I put them on so I can't return them now. Don't buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protection!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these because my dog was sick and having accidents, but now with children in the house, I have them on every bed. We've had plenty of minor accidents and not once have these mattress covers leaked. They are thin and hardly noisy at all, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: tl

customer_reviews.title: great, although there's a very slight plastic noise sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: great, although there's a very slight plastic noise sometimes when you lay down. It's not as bad as the last one I had, it is SLIGHT. It does not balloon like the last one I had; remember that it's essentially a waterproof bag around your mattress and some have a tendency to balloon up when you lay on them, but this one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Guest Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a bath towel, which is fine since its just to cover the mattress. Fits my guest queen bed nicely. Not sure if it really is waterproof as I have not had any experience to actually test that out. Looks nice, and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: YoSan

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After opening and viewing the product I had concerns about comfort, and possible crinkly noises. I was pleasantly surprised. I can't even tell it's there. I got this because my new puppy sleeps with me, and she had a few accidents. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof mattress lives up to its name! I have a puppy that peed on my bed. Thank God I had the protector on the bed. I just removed it, washed it, and its ready to be used again!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my couch so that my dogs don’t make the fabric a mess it’s not crunchy or waterproof feeling but actually works great. I ended up buying a second. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress cover. It is soft and washes well! I have washed it about a dozen times and it is still soft with no rips. I can not even tell it is on under the sheets. I use it for my sons queen bed. He is three and potty training still at night so we have had several accidents and have never had any leaks onto the mattress. It has a deep depth which can is nice if you have a thicker mattress. I loved it so much I ended purchasing another one so when I wash it I can just switch them out.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Stachowski

customer_reviews.title: Effective and low cost
customer_reviews.text: The first waterproof mattress pad I ever bought was over $70, so I was pretty skeptical about this one. I was pleasantly surprised however. It's light, washes (and more importantly) dries quickly. It fits over my deep double pillow top mattress with ease. One thing to be aware of however, the cloth top is basically a thin towel so you don't get much actual padding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK quality
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector does it job in keeping water out of the bed. However it is not soft and gives a little plasticky feel. I was not able to get stain out of the protector as well after one washing machine wash.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Loo

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Good product, fits the bed great . Just ordered another for my other bed. Thought it would be a little thicker water resistant material but still good product and I obviously did buy again
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Opened and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening it was torn and dirty. Going to try to wash it...
customer_reviews.author: Courtlynn1988

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and silent.
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof and silent, there is no plastic sound when moving on the bed. Kids don’t even know it is there and it keeps spills and accidents from getting to the mattress. It is also really easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: thanks to this mattress protector my mattress is still brand new! my son has spilled a lot of things on there and nothing has gotten through. i did buy a king size protector and theres still room to stretch so i wanna say that it might even fit a cali king but dont mark my words on that.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protector - does not make noise.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is just what I was looking for. We have an old dog and I expect the next thing to go will be her control so this will protect our new mattress. Also, it doesn't make any noise when sleeping on it and haven't noticed any sweating either.
customer_reviews.author: Patty no name

customer_reviews.title: To make it really "waterproof" you HAVE to get an ...
customer_reviews.text: To make it really "waterproof" you HAVE to get an incontinence pad to go under it. My children can leak through this thing alone no problem. Save $$, buy a cheap mattress pad and an incontinence pad to put under it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY Love this mattress cover. I was hesitant because the old school plastic ones are so hot and obnoxious.....this one is NOT noisy or made of that hot plastic, but is made out of a terry cloth material that absorbs sweat without making it feel wet, it stays cool and protects the mattress, with no noise, it's like sleeping on a towel that you can't feel. I am super happy with this purchase! (Also I have a 12" memory foam mattress and this fits perfectly!)
customer_reviews.author: spaceybez

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It was an okay product, does NOT cover/zip around whole mattress.. kinda sounds funny when you lay or move around on it
customer_reviews.author: Blonde Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to save our camper mattresses from all the dirt and bug spray. They wash well and you don’t hear the crinkle from the water barrier! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it for a while, and we love it. It doesn't sweat, yet is waterproof. It doesn't come off easily when I strip the sheets off the bed. I'm very happy with it. Now when it's time to replace the waterproof vinyl covers on the kids' beds (they wear out after a while), this is what I will get.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: No More Wet mattress
customer_reviews.text: My daughter never sleeps in her crib so we bought this for our queen mattress. I like the quality of fabric and it is water resistance. No more urine or potty in my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: @mit

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Its unkwn on water resistance... However if you sweat at night this isnt for you.. If you have a pillowtop this isnt suitable. My protector constantly slide rver move I made in the bed n getting out...
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, soft, waterproof and good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who has dementia and is in the beginning stage of forgetting to go to the bathroom. Or sometimes just doesn’t want to. This keeps the mattress dry. Is breathable and very soft. Easy to wash and dry when necessary. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 2 year olds bed. WORKS PERFECTLY! So far she hasn't been able to pull it off thanks to the deep pockets. And no leaking through to the mattress from any mess.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Chick

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dog likes to express her emotions sometimes by peeing on my bed. I have learned to put this mattress protector on my bed before leaving the house in the morning. It really works. If she pees on my bed, no urine goes through the protector so I only have to wash it instead of layers of bedding.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was stopping leaks through to the mattress, but it definitely is not. After a diaper leak, the mattress was wet. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years so I purchased another. It is easy to clean and breathable. Does a great job of capturing the spills so that did not absorb into the mattress. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: stangal

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is that they go on like a fitted sheet and on an adjustable bed I need to use sheet straps to keep it in place, otherwise it comes undone under the fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect for our needs. The pocket of the bedding is very large, and can accommodate a pillow-top mattress. The top is a terry-cloth like material, and doesn't make the bed noisy or plastic-sounding when you place a fitted sheet over it and lay on the bed. It washes wonderfully, and I have had no issues with it cracking, ripping, etc. and the elastic is holding up extremely well. I would absolutely recommend this for anyone that needs a waterproof mattress cover!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Rieder

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this waterproof mattress pad. I was concerned that it would crackle as plastic does, but there is no sound and the pad fit perfectly over my mattress and it does not feel obvious under the sheet. I hope not to ever find out if it is waterproof, but from the other reviews I read, I believe it is. I would recommend this pad and will most likely purchase one for the spare room as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lee Cross

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Breathes nicely, doesn't crinkle when you move, and most importantly waterproof! My dog unfortunately peed on my bed which had sit there likely all day. When I went to bed I finally felt it and stripped everything hurriedly. I was worried because I just spent 1k on a new mattress. To my relief this pad protector did exactly it's job and not a drop of moisture or sign of staining on the mattress. I'm getting a second bed soon and will be looking to purchase this at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Rogalski

customer_reviews.title: One word: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Would not ever buy again! Slid off the corners. Tore when we went to fix it and put it back on the bed. Returned it and bought a better one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Renner

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mattress protector. It's like a very thin "towel like" top that actually protects the mattress from getting wet. It doesn't crinkle or make noises or feels uncomfortable. It's feels as if there was nothing under the sheets, but the mattress. The pockets are dip (my mattress is 18') and smooth. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would really hug my bed and stay on tightly but it doesn't. It does the job, and the day after I put it on my kids got the NORO (?) virus an I was so thankful for the mattress cover. IT works well, but do NOT put it in a hot dryer. That's how I ruined my last one. I spin it well and then hang it on 2 chairs to dry or fluff dry. Even medium heat will melt it.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Had for 2 years and great
customer_reviews.text: I just bought more of these for 2nd home. they've been in first home for 2 years and they still look brand new. They have a soft feel, no plastic, and very comfortable to sleep on
customer_reviews.author: L. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Is not waterproof after first wash and air dry
customer_reviews.text: Did not work or hold the amount of urine for my 60 lb elderly dog. Seemed to work ok prior to first wash, but is not working now. I did not put in the dryer and air dried. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleLynn

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat but soft
customer_reviews.text: First time using.. It holds heat if you're hot or a hvy sweater when you sleep... It doesnt cool down.. But it is comfortable. Haven't tried the resistance of spills which I may not..
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened it and felt the material I decided to return. It was the most awful and cheap feeling terry cloth like fabric I ever bought. Spend alittle more and get something nicer
customer_reviews.author: Chloe D.

customer_reviews.title: Traps body heat.
customer_reviews.text: I have never sweat so much in my entire life. While it is GREAT at catching liquids and keeping them off the mattress, it traps moisture between the sheet and the fitted sheet. I would wake up in a puddle of sweat. Like sweat dripping off of me. in 30 degree weather with my windows thrown open.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Not noisy
customer_reviews.text: I love that this bed cover is not noisy. We bought it for an occasional guest with bed wetting risk. I was so impressed that I bought one for our master bed to protect it from messes our newborn might make, or my own milk leaks. We can’t even tell there is a waterproof cover on. I’m so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Thor

customer_reviews.title: don't even notice it there
customer_reviews.text: this is something you need its like a back up a diaper for the mattress spent so much on the damn mattress you gotta get a cover right? i actually put a liner over the mattress cover too so yeah i actually never even really notice it good to know its waterproof not that that would happened
customer_reviews.author: brian chan the man

customer_reviews.title: Handles spills big or small.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that drools a ton and these protect my futon and bed from getting stained. I've spilled a good bit of water on them by accident as well and have never had any leaks. Good product for anyone who's clumsy or has pets/children!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and loud
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to spill anything on it so I can't attest to the waterproof-ness of it, however I can tell you that the material is atrocious. The bottom layer is some sort of vinyl plastic and crinkles loudly with every small movement. Not only that, but the top layer is rough and the material can be felt through my sheet. Extremely uncomfortable. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: JUST RECEIVED, I ALWAYS WASH MY NEW ITEMS BEFORE USE, GREAT QUALITY WITH NO PLASTIC ON BACK. THE MATERIAL USED ON THE BACK FOR SPILLS IS UNKNOWN TO ME, BUT I DID A TEST USING WATER AND IT DID NOT STAIN NOR WET MY MATTRESS.
customer_reviews.author: mukka

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have little kids, or pets prone to accidents.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as one of our 'scaredy cats' still has accidents when she fries frightened. Yep, doesn't matter where she is. This is good to have on the bed in the bedroom she's in, so the memory foam mattress doesn't get all wet. Memory foam remembers, and it remembers all too well! So this is a must have. I bought two so one can be on the bed while the other needs washed. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kisa

customer_reviews.title: When get stained just hard to get rid of it
customer_reviews.text: Got some mark from my kid’s nose blood we try to washed it few time but the stain won’t go
customer_reviews.author: Ade Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to get onto my mattress and she's fit over a perfectly fine it. This job perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I thought it said that it was water proof. My puppy has been peeing on my bed and the last time she peed, my blankets and sheets and this protector all had a big pee stain on them.. Along with the mattress underneath. I guess I should get rubber sheets if I expect it to be water proof. They are easy to wash, so I'm sure that they would work if your just protecting your mattress from sweat
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased similar sheets from my mattress store for $60 each and these work just as well as the other sheets if not better. They are very soft and don't make crinkly noises or anything. No stains on my mattress so far. I have two of these and swap them every time I clean my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent and cost-effective mattress protector which also serves to make your existing mattress more comfortable, and also adds insurance against certain unexpected events--should they occur. The material is soft to the touch and it is substantial--not flimsy at all. For the price you simply cannot do any better-in my humble estimation. Most highly recommended item--and the seller was also noteworthy and deserves special commendation.
customer_reviews.author: eva & tom

customer_reviews.title: Plasticky
customer_reviews.text: Has an unpleasant plastic feeling and I would never want to sleep with it on my bed. Worked ok for my use which was to cover the floor of my dog's play area when I first got him and needed to protect the carpet
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pope

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had accident in our bed and everything soaked through to brand new mattress. Not sure why reviews are good. I got three for different beds, will replace all.
customer_reviews.author: kittyma

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Update: turns out the fitted sheet in one set of our sheets wasn't deep enough for our mattress so it was the problem! This is actually a great mattress cover, protects from toddler spills and dog messes. Would buy again. Original review: Slips right off the corners of the mattress, bringing the sheets with it. I basically have to remake my bed every time I'm ready to sleep. Awful, do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rygg

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Good find, hasn’t spilled water but material looks right, very soft and perfect for kids too.
customer_reviews.author: JB Florida

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Cali King
customer_reviews.text: Product as described used it for my Cali king and fit great
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Much have item.
customer_reviews.text: Water proof. Can't even tell that it even on your bed. Great item. Must have to keep mattress in good shape. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: works from newborn accidents and hubby too slow
customer_reviews.text: it works. we needed a cover for my hubby who is like a slug at changing a diaper and one too many accidents.
customer_reviews.author: tina c

customer_reviews.title: The materia is somehow thin. But it still serves ...
customer_reviews.text: The materia is somehow thin. But it still serves the purpose. As the price is significantly lower than similar products, it is still worth to buy. But if you want to buy a high quality waterproof mattress protector, this is not the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: This mattress protector works great. It fits super snug
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector works great. It fits super snug, but easily fits my child's 12-inch thick mattress. Also, it doesn't make noise like other protectors do when you move on it and it doesn't bunch up. The top of the protector is a soft cotton like material rather than a vinyl or plastic feeling material. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this if you have a memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap and fit well but thats the end of the benefits. We have a Casper bed and this seams to block the cooling technology in our mattress; we sweat for the 3 nights we had this on. I don't recommend this if you have a memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make you sweat
customer_reviews.text: This is the best waterproof mattress. I bough one that was more expensive & made me sweat at Target (the target brand). This is cheaper & more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispi

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress protectors!
customer_reviews.text: These are a staple and favorite in our house. Each of our 3 bedrooms has these on the beds! And with 3 small children, spills or potty accidents dont worry me because nothing has leaked through these mattress protectors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Waterproof Mattress Protector - Breathable Mattress Cover - Fitted Style All Around Elastic (Queen)
feature_bullets: MATTRESS PROTECTOR - Fits Queen size mattress perfectly with dimensions 60 inches by 80 inches by 17 inches, featuring professionally turned hems and deep fitted pockets

COTTON TERRY BLEND - A blended surface of cotton (70%) and polyester (30%) preserves the soft, cozy, noiseless and breathable feel of your mattress; waterproof top and high-quality seam construction stops water and urine from passing through; it protects the mattress from dust mites
FITTED STYLE ALL AROUND ELASTIC - Mattress protector with a fitted style all round elastic has airflow technology that allows air to circulate through the protector but repels liquids
OEKO-TEX CERTIFIED - Oeko-Tex Standard 100 factory certification ensures that the fabric meets the safety and environmental standards
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine wash cold or warm on gentle cycle; tumble dry low; do not iron; do not bleach; do not use fabric softener

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,280 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
